title: Happy Birthday, You-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Do this here~.... Alright, done! Phew~, these outfits turned out pretty good. I hope everyone will like them~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You-chan, You-chaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hm? Oooi, I’m over here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I-, I finally found you.... You-chaaaaaaaaan!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Uwah!? Wa-.... Chika-chan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Geez~, I panicked because I couldn’t find you~. I told you we’re gonna have your birthday party today, didn’t I? It should be under my congrats message.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Did you forget~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha.... I was so preoccupied with these outfits.... Here, look! They’re great, right? You also said you were looking forward to the next outfit, didn’t you, Chika-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Waaah! Amazing! They’re so cute~~~!! Wait, no! Well, they are cute, but that’s not the point. Today you’re more important than these outfits, You-chan. Come on, we’re going~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Wawaah, I can walk on my own, okay? No need to push me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Are you sure? You won’t get distracted by something else again....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>No trust, huh? Alright, here. Let’s hold hands. Now you can be sure, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Yep, I can rest easy now! Let’s go, You-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
